import re

    """"""
    modified_string = re.sub('\\bI\\b', 'He', word_string)
    modified_string = re.sub('\\bI(?=[.,;:!?])', 'He', modified_string)
    return modified_string

import re

def replace_pronoun(word_string):
    """
    Replace all instances of the first person singular pronoun "I" 
    (including those appended with punctuation marks) with the third person singular pronoun "He" in a given string.

    Args:
    word_string (str): The input string.

    Returns:
    str: The modified string with "I" replaced by "He".
    """
    modified_string = re.sub('', 'He', word_string)
    modified_string = re.sub('\\bI(?=[.,;:!?])', 'He', modified_string)
    return modified_string

import re

def replace_pronoun(word_string):
    """
    Replace all instances of the first person singular pronoun "I" 
    (including those appended with punctuation marks) with the third person singular pronoun "He" in a given string.

    Args:
    word_string (str): The input string.

    Returns:
    str: The modified string with "I" replaced by "He".
    """
    modified_string = re.sub('\\bI\\b', '', word_string)
    modified_string = re.sub('\\bI(?=[.,;:!?])', 'He', modified_string)
    return modified_string

import re

def replace_pronoun(word_string):
    """
    Replace all instances of the first person singular pronoun "I" 
    (including those appended with punctuation marks) with the third person singular pronoun "He" in a given string.

    Args:
    word_string (str): The input string.

    Returns:
    str: The modified string with "I" replaced by "He".
    """
    modified_string = re.sub('\\bI\\b', 'He', word_string)
    modified_string = re.sub('', 'He', modified_string)
    return modified_string

import re

def replace_pronoun(word_string):
    """
    Replace all instances of the first person singular pronoun "I" 
    (including those appended with punctuation marks) with the third person singular pronoun "He" in a given string.

    Args:
    word_string (str): The input string.

    Returns:
    str: The modified string with "I" replaced by "He".
    """
    modified_string = re.sub('\\bI\\b', 'He', word_string)
    modified_string = re.sub('\\bI(?=[.,;:!?])', '', modified_string)
    return modified_string
